resources.string: Download large files (over %d MB) faster by using Wi-Fi and 4G networks at the same time. The Download booster icon will be shown on the status bar while Download booster is running. We recommend disabling the Via Wi-Fi only download option while using Download booster to improve your experience. Note that some third-party applications may be able to use Download booster even if the Via Wi-Fi only download option is enabled for them.
